Reviews.Title: Not Useful
Reviews.Author: Lanca Killikelly
Reviews.Content: This product is not useful at all.Sprint cannot activate due to the fact the phone does not have a security tracking chip built in.In addition, the VENDOR would not allow for a return or refund of their product.I will NEVER recommend this VENDOR BY NAME OR COMPANY TO ANYONE.

ProductInfo.Features:
This product has been carefully audited and is certified to be 100% functional.
This offer includes the following accessories 1. Battery 2. Battery Cover (if applicable) 3. Wall Charger
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung SPH-M300 Black No Contract Sprint Cell Phone
